author: Courtenay Brown
title: Stocks drop 4% after Trump's coronavirus warning
description: Stocks closed more than 4% lower on Wednesday, continuing a volatile stretch for the stock market amid the coronavirus outbreak. Between the lines : The declines come after President Trump on Tuesday braced the country for a "very painful" few weeks "like we'…
content:
